text: The Subaru Sambar is a cabover kei truck and microvan that is currently made by Daihatsu. The Subaru Sambar is common in Japan and is uncommon in the United States and Canada but is sent to these countries when people buy them. However, Subaru did make some Sambars to be sold in the United States. == Related pages == * Subaru * Subaru Brat == References == Sambar Category:Pickup trucks Category:1960s automobiles Category:1970s automobiles Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Subaru Sambar
